about.title: About
about.name: I am Jose Castro a
about.p: My name is Jose Jehovani Castro Perez, I am a systems engineer with a focus on Web development using html-css and javaScript, in addition to the use of react, which I have learned by watching tutorials mainly in English because I have intermediate level in that language. Apart from web development I have photo editing skills with Photoshop and video editing with Filmora which I have been learning as a hobby, being inspired by creations from French editors as I am also learning that language
